results.description: Ratscam is a game that took the FOMO3D infrastruct
results.fullDescription: Ratscam is a game that took the FOMO3D infrastructure and improved it - by simplifying it. The game has only one team, meaning the confusion is done away with the and playing field is level. The distribution of funds that come in through buys places a heavier emphasis on dividend earnings for existing mice holders, with the pot coming second. The rest is dispersed among authorized rat deals (referral links), a 'welcome gift lottery, and team mouse.

results.name: WorldFomo
results.description: WorldFomo is a game that draws upon the existing i
results.fullDescription:
WorldFomo is a game that draws upon the existing infrastructure that FOMO3D provided which we have made alterations with to affect the way the game plays. This means different approaches and strategies can be developed by players, and at the same time the problems endemic to some bits of the original such as the exploitable airdrop pot have been addressed (in this case, the airdrop pots have been removed and ether that would've gone to them gets rerouted to existing keyholder's instead in the form of dividends). Choose between your team of China, America, Europe, or choose FFA when buying keys. Referrals will also be given 15% instead of 10% of their referee's buy.

This dapp is not affiliated with/owned by the original Fomo3D, check the source code and use it on your own risk.

results.name: Zethr
results.description: Zethr is a decentralized casino where YOU can be t
results.fullDescription: Zethr is a decentralized casino where YOU can be the house. With a 250 ETH ico that prevents token price from dumping, holders of the ZTH token will benefit from the house edge in games when players bid with ZTH tokens.

results.name: Lucky8D
results.description: Lucky8D is first and foremost an addition to the a
results.fullDescription: Lucky8D is first and foremost an addition to the already existing dApp game titled "World FOMO", as well as a reformatting of the traditional pyramid structure made popular by the current status quo of the space. Our changed referral system has been the emphasis of our project, which provide a 3-tier waterfall that allows any holder of Lucky8D tokens to be at the helm of. The referrals of your referrals now earn you a referral bonus, AND the referrals of them too! Tack on our 20% buy/sell fee which are distributed as dividends to ALL holders, a 0% transfer fee on tokens, and the last thing: there is a World FOMO token holder account which will send the dividends it makes daily to our project World FOMO allowing an ecosystem to flourish.

results.description: InTime is a decentralized, trustless blockchain ga
results.fullDescription: InTime is a decentralized, trustless blockchain game running directly on the Ethereum network. The game is carefully programmed and deployed by smart contracts. It is completely decentralized and uncontrolled by anyone. It will automatically run until the Ethereum network dies, no matter how attractive the pool is, it will only pay according to the rules of the game.

results.name: PoohMo
results.description: PoohMo is a Fomo3D-type game with a changed schema
results.fullDescription: PoohMo is a Fomo3D-type game with a changed schematic that sends 10% of every key purchase to existing holders of POOH tokens (https://www.number2.io/), that breaks down as: On every key purchase: 49% to keyholders 30% to pot 10% to POOHholders (20% if no referral link used to buy keys) 10% to referral payouts (if applicable, if no referral link used, % goes to POOHholders) 1% to dev When Round ends: 48% to winner 15% to keyholders 10% to POOHholders 25% to next round 2% to dev

The game is divided into two stages: fuel filling and rocket launching. The fuel filling stage: the user purchases fuel and continues to enjoy the dividend; the rocket launching stage: using the bidding method, the bidder no longer receives fuel, and finally the bidder receives all funds from the Pot pool

results.name: PitchingPennies
results.description: Ever played Pitch N Toss? It's an old-school g
results.fullDescription: Ever played Pitch N Toss? It's an old-school game in which people throw coins towards a wall and the one who lands closest to the wall takes all the coins. We are happy to announce that you can now play Pitch N Toss with real Ether using our developed smart contract. We are sick and tired of nonsense whitepapers, we believe that cheap whitepaper approach to ICO is vulnerable to fraudsters. We don't want those in crypto. We believe actions speak louder than words, so instead of meaningless whitepapers we decided to do prototypes. Let this game serve as one such prototype for many more to come. (play with any wallet that supports smart contracts)
